message: Yusaku: "It's a rather delicate situation, isn't it?"
Yusaku: "You're not quite as experienced as I'd expected."
It's not like I feel happy being praised.
This isn't done out of love.
Of course, I'm not used to this kind of behavior.
But the real problem is this ridiculously large size.
It won't fit in my mouth.
Yusaku: "So this is your real skill, huh?"
Yusaku: "Well, I'll give you credit for the effort of taking it in your mouth."
Please, just break it all at once.
Yusaku: "I can't make a decision just yet."
Yusaku: "We'll find out whether you're lying or not soon enough."
He's definitely doing this on purpose.
As I curse him, I become more determined.
I need to get into a situation where I can hear the rest soon.
The fear is growing the longer this goes on.
It's not just the fear of someone coming here.
And only the chief and I are missing.
He'll definitely go out looking for us.
Yusaku: "You seem to be putting more effort into it than before."
I immediately grope above my thigh.
What my fingers touched was a torn envelope.
It's thicker than I thought, what did he stuff in there?
It's like I'm under a spell.
Each time I hear the sound of tearing, my desperation grows.
If someone saw this, they might think I'm enjoying it.
At first, I was just barely able to take in the tip.
The rough surface of his penis.
Now, about half of it is drenched in my saliva.
Everything is just as the chief wants.
Even though I know that, I can't stop.
If there was another way forward, I would have run away a long time ago.
In front of me, the chief is blocking the way.
If I resist even a little, I'll fall to the bottom of the valley.
It's a free fall with Sho.
How long will this agony continue?
I've lost track of how long I've been licking.
I want to finish this quickly.
I want to return to the room before Sho wakes up.
But in order to make that happen, I'm sure...
The trigger to be released from this pain.
I'm not a child, I can guess that much.
But when I think about it, I feel crushed by despair.
I'm in a weak position, like an abandoned puppy.
I have no choice but to accept whatever happens.
So I'm clinging to a faint possibility.
That he'll finish tearing it up before the worst case scenario happens.
The chief's goodwill, whether it exists or not.
Yusaku: "Uh, I think I can make a decision soon."
His suggestive words sent a chill down my spine.
As a proof that it's not just words, his penis stiffened greatly.
The premonition I feared the most.
It's the same as when Sho was about to ejaculate.
Even without that, I've been keeping it in my mouth.
It wouldn't be strange if he had finished already.
It's almost a wonder that he hasn't so far.
How can he endure it so much?
Or am I just bad at this?
I'm questioning something I don't even want.
It's strange to be normal when I'm being forced to do something I don't want to do.
I've grown to hate everything about this man.
His nagging personality that takes advantage of people's weaknesses.
Why does such a person exist?
I'm sure I'm not the only one he's made miserable.
If you think about it, so is Sho.
He was bullied before I was put through this ordeal.
Getting involved was the beginning of the disaster.
Now all I can do is curse our meeting.
And in my mouth, no less.
I've never even done that with Sho.
Being the first one before my loved one is the worst.
That's why I want to run away.
I want to spit out what I have in my mouth right now.
But I can't let go of his penis.
Because my disgust at the sound of tearing up the letter can't overcome it.
In a little more time, I'll finish tearing up another letter.
Is he stopping at the last moment?
There's no way he can control it.
No matter how much he endures, he can't resist it.
I knew as much from my past experiences.
Even my ex-boyfriend and Sho were the same.
This man must be exceptional in every way.
Just like the size of his penis.
So, he'll probably ejaculate an unbelievable amount.
When I think about it, even the stain on his underwear was impressive.
That was in a dry state.
It must be an absurd amount, no doubt.
Probably because I was thinking about something strange and my disgust increased.
An afterglow like a heavy numbness.
For some reason, it feels like when I need to urinate.
Yusaku: "W-we haven't finished tearing it all up yet."
Babuu, dokun, dokun, babuu, dokun, dokun...
